name: Clash N Splash
description:
Clash N Splash is a demake of an old pc game called Clash N Slash. This game was made for "STOP WAITING FOR GODOT" jam hosted by Terry Cavanagh. It is a basic space shoot-em-up game where you defend your planet against alien ufo's. This is the first game I have ever made. So I am deeply grateful for Terry Cavanagh for creating this game jam, thank you. I also can't wait for your feedback and thanks for checking the game out.

All planets are generated using the Pixel Planet Generator by Deep-Fold.
The music used is from patrickdearteaga.com by Patrick de Arteaga.
Font used in the game Coolville Font by Tyler Finck.
Other assets are created by me.
